showerReviews.reviewText: Very poor service üëéüèº ,I wasn't allowed to take a shower in the morning, and they told me I had to bring the card in person, but I don't know where it is in the truck. All the information is on my phone. For example, there are no such ‚Ä¶

Today (Aug 13, 2025), I bought shampoo and paid before heading to my shower. An employee, not a cashier or security, loudly accused me of stealing in front of everyone without checking with the cashier first. after shower Even after ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ not explain why the loves app doesn't work in WI correctly and the subway attached to it is just as bad. We got a shower and all the snacks at the other loves we stopped at which was much better sad to see when we go to loves all the time
This is a 17 dollar shower. ‚Ä¶

Has to be the worst Loves I have ever visited in 24 years. Half way through shower water turns off. Now I was warned by the manager that it would be, but he said 15 minutes not 5. Fuel desk clerk was rude and seems to hate her job. Subway ‚Ä¶

Good place to make a pit stop, fuel up, eat, and relax.

You can even take a shower!

Great place for truckers and car drivers.

Staff is friendly. Subway is on the premises. Fuel prices are about average.
First time to take used thier shower. Wow! It's big inside and so clean. Keep it up guys!
Very clean bathrooms and shower rooms. Very friendly staff and plenty of parking space.

‚Ä¶ the year. Today 02/15/2024 @ appx 1800 I went inside to get a shower using one of my employees card that he had sent to me and this guy rudely told me that loves has a new policy that you cannot use someone's else card. I request to ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ the issue then perhaps a better pay package might need to be implemented. I‚Äôve been a dedicated Love‚Äôs customer for over 20 years and I only fuel and shower at Love‚Äôs. I know the company is capable of doing a much better job in staffing ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice ,clean little truck stop. They have 1 shower and they provide a towel and wash rag. All for the low price of $8. Cleaner than most TA's. They have a small truck parking area that has probably 15-20 spots. The prices are cheaper than ‚Ä¶
‚Ä¶ There is 1 shower here which is convenient and it was very clean. They do provide a fresh towel and wash cloth. ‚Ä¶

Great crew and nice shower available for $8.00.
Parking $10.00 after 4 hours.
Excellent restaurant next door home cooking favorite Foods from 6am-3pm!
5 minutes away from Ameicold Appleton Wisconsin

Very friendly staff. The shower was well cleaned and not too small. The store is well kept and stocked. Limited hours but it gives the traditional values vibe. Diner Nextdoor is probably fantastic because it‚Äôs always full!
Only about 15 parking spots at $10 daily, shower price 8 or 10 dollars nice store, great dinner next door at good prices
This place is great. Really nice employees and shower is clean. They're pretty cheap on prices for sure
Nice and friendly staff $8 for shower. They only have one but it nice and clean with Hot waterü§ó. Truck parking for about 20 trucks behind the diner. It close at 11pm. ‚Ä¶
They close at 8pm have only one shower, the owners work there and they are amazing that made the five star.
Not too bad. Small Place, have obe shower
Good price for a shower but there's only one and it has no toilet in it

showerReviews.reviewText: This place use to be a gem. Now its trash. Employees are trash. Parking lot is trash. Food is trash. Showers are trash. I wish I could find one nice thing to say about this place but im coming up blank. Had to edit. I left one thing out. The entire place smells like trash. You can smell it before you pull in the parking lot.

Not a bad little truck stop. After reading the reviews, i was skeptical, but it wasn't bad. I've been trucking a long time. I've seen some nasty truck stops. I'd say this one's about a five out of ten. You want to bring your own food, but the showers were ten bucks and clean.
Nice gas station has all that you‚Äôll need for snacks and pleasure! Lots of parking and ada compliant. The place was mostly clean the men‚Äôs bathroom needs some cleaning attention.
Not sure what happened to this place. It used to be a great trick stop to stop at, one that you could count on being clean and welcoming. Not so much anymore, sadly. ‚Ä¶

Ladies, please use caution when stopping here to use the restroom!

This station was always my go-to stop on the way to/from Madison. Usually for ‚Ä¶

Black middle age guy took a poop and didnt wash his hands. Left and went back to checking out people and touched my stuff and a family‚Äôs food with their kid. I deep cleaned my drink but feel bad for that family. This is unacceptable

It's an older truck stop, but there's quite a bit of parking. The store has the normal truckstop items and there is also Chester's chicken inside. I was disappointed in their pet policy. The bathrooms all have electric dryers, so there are ‚Ä¶

Love the truck parking (around 20 spots) and they have 2 showers here ($8 or free if you buy 50 gallons of Diesel or more) The lady behind the food counter (3/16/23 - 6pm) was not friendly & talking to the woman cashier so it took a while ‚Ä¶

Typical Citgo truck stop.

Clean and nice selection of items inside. Nothing out of the ordinary though. ‚Ä¶

Awesome truck stop with a huge parking area. Good food inside, polite, quick, efficient, friendly staff all around. Bathrooms were clean. Easy access to fuel pumps. Lighted parking lot. Fairly level and all paved. Didnt see any giant pot ‚Ä¶
Frequently stop here. Good parking, half decent food. 2 sets of bathrooms
Very nice people.they have a small hot table that sells hamburgers stuffed bell peppers what not. They also sell beer wine etc. they have showers but no commode

showerReviews.reviewText: A mom & pop travel plaza right off of US 151N & 26s here in waaupun, WI. It's about 10 miles from the walmart DC in beaver Dam, WI. 4 diesel islands, a good size lot for truck parking. Lot is clean and well maintained. Sit down restaurant ‚Ä¶

What a gem!!
Super nice and clean local truck stop with nice restaurants. They also sells verity of tasty frozen pot pie, breakfast burrito, pizza‚Ä¶ etc. ‚Ä¶
Kind of high on price but that container is dish washer safe üòÇ for sure reusable ‚Ä¶

Awesome little truck stop ample truck parking and great breakfast and very clean envoronment and friendly staff. The trucking industry needs more truck stops like this. Like it used to be when I was a young man starting out driving, the big ‚Ä¶

Finding this place is a Lucky one at night when you need to take 10 hrs break as a CDL driver. Nice and clean as others comment. This Truck Stop seems to be a new one, and it just 10 miles away from Walmart DC, so if you have Load to get or ‚Ä¶
Plenty of room to park with a clean store & restroom with nice folks. The coffee is good as are the Sausage Egg and Hash Brown Burritos. The restaurant looked nice too.

Fantastic lil maw n paw truck stop. It has nice showers, a place to do laundry and a 10 thumbs üëç up cafe attached. We had breakfast and lunch there and it was so good that we bought to go chili and chicken pot pie soup to go for lunch the next day.  Absolutely fabulous lil gem of a place. We will definitely be back. üòäüëèüëè ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: This truck stop is very NASTY shower disgusting not clean and the argue with you that they just cleaned them if this is clean, I would hate to see your house utterly disgusting. Look at the photos hairs and corn pads in the shower toilet ‚Ä¶

A step back in time! At least on the outside. The inside is clean, well maintained, stocked and modern. Plenty of car/truck/RV parking and handicap accessible spaces. On the menu, McDonald's, Subway, Taco Bell is next door, Culver's is ‚Ä¶

Actually I give one star for upstairs disgusting truckers lounge and nasty showers and laundry.  Check out the pictures because I bet you can smell the carpet. But it's actually 4 to 5 stars downstairs because it's clean bright nice Subway nice McDonald's some pretty good prices good freezer section.
Using this truck stop more than a decade. New management has done great job in changing showers and driver lounge. Best maintained showers ever, with great price and hot water.
Plenty of parking. McDonald‚Äôs and subway inside. 4 diesel pumps for semis. Showers too. Pay for dropped trailers. Several restaurants within walking distance

New owners so now they charge for parking. I think it‚Äôs $15.00. I bought a $12.00 shower and got the parking for free. Nice shower. I would suggest bring your own towels. Lots of good near by walking distance. Workers there are really nice.

showerReviews.reviewText: Had a friend just stopped wanted to take a shower and eat. 2 ladies behind the counter told him  it be a hour or longer for the showers to be cleaned. There was only 2 other trucks in the whole parking lot.  What bs

Great place to stop and get something to eat or take a shower.
Showers are 5.00 and parking lot has plenty of parking. Restaurant has great food and the staff is friendly.
I'll be back..

Went in to try to get a shower, story about one of their showers is out of order, no sign on that door, another about they have a customer in there from last night, other assorted b.s. left. Parking lot is large as mentioned b4. Some food ‚Ä¶
Nice truckstop. Wont find a nicer $5 shower. Good food in resturaunt and large selection of local smoked meats and cheese. Think i gained 10lbs in 34hrs
Beautiful and clean, big shower rooms only $5 ( if you don't fuel, they only have 3 tho)
Great out of knowhere place.passed by in route to loaded.i came back took clean shower n great breakfast üç≥. would tell everyone about this gem in woods ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: This IS the hughest truck stop I‚Äôve ever been to. There‚Äôs soooooo many shop area and plenty of fast food restaurants as well as a sit down restaurant. It was surprisingly very clean, even the restrooms. Great job to everyone. You were all so very nice and courteous. Hope to see you again.

Got a hot coffee here and used the bathroom. Wanted to spot by to see what it was like and it was pretty cool. Lots of different snacks and things for truckers. They had a big food court here and a truck museum near that we didnt get to see overall a good experience.  Cute little stop on our way to Chicago
